title: Cursive Lettering in a Tattoo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828225859im_/http:/typophile.com/files/believe_3794.jpg)
 I have a client who wants this font, and I can't find it, though I've found ones that are close. It could have been free-handed, but it looks a little too neat. If anyone knows what it is, please help!
author: nobleskinartist

comments.content: All three of the 'e's are different so it was probably hand drawn.
